Class UserInterface

java.lang.Object
scs3grp5.ui.controller.UserInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
UICampList, UIEditCamp, UIEnquiry, UIEnquiryList, UIHomepage, UINonPrivilegedCamp, UIPrivilegedCamp, UISuggestion, UISuggestionList, UIViewAccount
public abstract class UserInterface extends Object implements IUserInterface
This abstract class is a UI controller for the most of the UI
